ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T16:07:37 urn:asin:B0BZG73BKC Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 21:07:13. [Issue ID 2605179]
ComicInfo.Summary: Belle "Anabelle" DiMarco's waking world is haunted by the beasts that she is sworn to hunt, but when something causes those same creatures to pervade her dreams, she begins to question her own sanity. Now, she must fight a battle that she can't dream of winning -but with the help of an uneasy ally she may be able to wake from this nightmare! Guest starring Sleeping Beauty!
ComicInfo.Colorist: Elmer Santos,Ivan Nunes,Juan Manuel Rodriguez,Maxflan Araujo,Urszula Mos
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Carla Cohen,Elmer Santos,Ian McDonald,Ignacio Noe,Igor Vitorino,Ivan Nunes,Jordi Tarragona Garcia,Paul Green,Pierluigi Abbondanza,Urszula Mos
